af-error:
Used as a wrapper around error messages. Parameters:
* $1 - the parser function that caused the error
* $2 - the error
af-error-incorrect-type:
Error message given a given parameter does not have the expected type. Parameters:
* $1 - the type that was expected
* $2 - the type of the value that was given
* $3 - the name or index of the parameter for which the type mismatch occurred
* $4 - the value of the parameter
af-error-incorrect-argument-count-at-lea:
Error message given when not enough arguments are given to a parser function. Parameters:
* $1 - the minimum expected number of parameters
* $2 - the actual number of parameters
See also:
* {{msg-mw|af-error-incorrect-argument-count-at-most}}
af-error-incorrect-argument-count-at-mos:
Error message given when too many arguments are given to a parser function. Parameters:
* the maximum expected number of parameters
* the actual number of parameters
See also:
* {{msg-mw|af-error-incorrect-argument-count-at-least}}
af-error-missing-required-keyword-argume:
Error message given when a required keyword argument is missing. Parameters:
* $1 - the name of the keyword argument that is missing
af-error-unexpected-keyword-argument:
Error message given when an unknown keyword argument is given. Parameters:
* $1 - the name of the keyword argument that is given
af-error-invalid-template-name:
Error message given when passing an invalid title to some parser functions. Parameters:
* $1 - the title that was passed
af-error-template-does-not-exist:
Error message given when passing a title that does not exist to some parser functions. Parameters:
* $1 - the title that was passed
af-error-template-loop-detected:
Error message given when trying to expand a template such that it causes a template loop. Parameters:
* $1 - the title that would cause the template loop
af-error-max-template-depth-reached: Error message given when trying to expand a template after the maximum template depth has been reached.
af-error-template-inclusion-denied: Error message given when trying to expand a template that the user may not view or that may not be included.
af-error-value-not-showable: Error message given when trying to show a value that is not showable.
af-error-range-zero-step: Error message given when trying to use 0 as the step value in #af_range.
af-error-max-range-size-exceeded: Error message given when trying to construct a range larger than $wgArrayFunctionsMaxRangeSize.
af-error-foreach-iteration-limit-reached: Error message given when the maximum number of iterations specified by $wgArrayFunctionsForeachIterationLimit is reached.
af-smw-result-printer-name:
{{optional}}
The name of the 'arrayfunctions' result format.
